title: Endless AFK's
body: Game after game after game after game after game of afk's and poor unskilled players.the ranking system is so broken its not even funny any more.you got smurfs nearly every game which are wrecking the ranking system.Riot dont really seem to care as long as they are getting your money for riot points.there is no way of really getting out of bronze without getting help from smurfs.There needs to be and option where u can add players to a list so u never get matched on the same team as them.I am really disappointed with riots whole attitude towarss this.They are only worried about high end player and as long as they have a good gaming experience the dont care about the average guy

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Rollston,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=wcpq6wAF,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-23T07:29:21.089+0000)
>
> Game after game after game after game after game of afk's and** poor unskilled players**.

* **Unskilled players in bronze (especially bronze 5)... what?!** Sorry buddy, but looking at your match history you fall under the category you describe of 'unskilled'. 
* Riot can't actually control smurfs because they have no way of knowing who is a smurf and who isn't. Don't just say 'they would be really good considering where they are' because people can get good via other means. Also, a different email address must be used to create an account so no way of checking that.
* Oceania has a small player base (reason why we can't have TT and Dominion) so enabling a feature that allows you to have a list that says you don't want to play with these people would screw over match making completely. From what I have read, there are 189,000 ish ranked players, the most being in silver 5. If you start compiling a list of who you don't want to play with, you would essentially be having to wait 20 minutes for a match. 
* Lastly, in case you hadn't realised, Riot has implemented the leaver buster system that dishes out hard punishments for those who AFK (both intentionally and not)

> a different email address must be used to create an account

Really? Did not know that. I've got two accounts using the same email.
:( Maybe I was wrong about that. It asked me for a different address to create my other account

there is no way of really getting out of bronze without getting help from smurfs.
